snippet: The name of a man disqualified from running for Navajo president because of his language skills will remain on the ballot, and the election will proceed as planned Nov. 4.
abstract: Name of Chris Deschene, Arizona man disqualified from running for Navajo president because of his language skills, will remain on Arizona ballot, and the election will proceed as planned.
lead_paragraph: The name of a man disqualified from running for Navajo president because of his language skills will remain on the ballot, and the election will proceed as planned Nov. 4.

headline.main: Arizona: Disputed Candidate Stays on Navajo Ballot
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Disputed Candidate Stays on Navajo Ballot
